title: Ninja armor
summaries: Ninja armor or Ninja set is an armor/vanity set made up of the Ninja Hood, Ninja Shirt and Ninja Pants. King Slime drops each piece separately (1 per kill with a 1:3 chance each), or two pieces from the Treasure Bag it drops in Expert Mode. In the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, pieces of the Ninja set can also be acquired from Lepus, but with only a 3% chance.

• In the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it provides very little defense, but increases velocity and damage of throwing weapons.
  • In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it provides very little defense, but increases crit chance and movement speed.
  • In the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it provides no defense, but does have throwing weapon bonuses listed in its stats. However, it does not provide the bonuses listed, and throwing damage is not a separate damage type in these versions.
  • In the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, it is merely a vanity item and will provide no bonuses or defense.
In all versions though, having the full set equipped grants an after-image movement effect, similar to Shadow, Necro, and Cobalt armors.
